description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission ref: P2020/0126/S73, dated 10/08/2020. The applicant seeks to vary the wording of Condition 2 (Drawing and Document Numbers) to allow for the relocation of the approved cycle stores. The applicant also seeks to vary the wording of Condition 20 (Refuse/Recycling) to allow for the provision of a new recycling bin enclosure after the occupation of the new development.
site_name: Land At Wedmore Estate Wedmore Estate
